description: {x
{*As you enter this stretch of the hallway you can feel the hair-raising tingle of
static electricity, no doubt caused by the new change in arrow design.. these are
tipped with a crackling voltage, causing the room to light up with blue and white sparks.{x
99864.name: Hallway In The Crypt

description: {x
{*There is not much to be discovered in this hallway as it's nearly pitch black
and only goes one way.. north.  Nothing can be seen in the distance.  It might be
wise to continue with caution.{x
99870.name: Short Hallway

description: {x
{*You are in a small, enclosed room without an entrance, the only exit being down
a wooden ladder protruding through a hole in the middle of the stone floor.  There
isn't much choice from here on.. the only way out is to continue.  Or die.{x
99853.name: Crypt Entrance

description: The Immortal's Lounge suits it company.  It's {Wf{Yl{rawless{Yl{Wy{x constructed with enough luxuries
to make the most powerful rulers in the realms begin to {*dro{wol{x.  The room itself is
constructed in a circular shape.. directly in the middle is a hot tub large enough
to support a dozen bodies.  Circling the hot tub is a set of stairs, with two steps
that lead to the next elevation of the lounge.  This section carries several enormous
{*cou{Wc{*hes{x that look so comfortable it's amazing anybody has the will to get out of
them.  Amongst the couches are large {Rl{wuxur{Ry{x chairs, each facing a shimmering film of
liquid, suspended in the air showing the viewer whichever mortal he or she is in the
mood to spy on.  Circling the sitting area is another set of stairs, also with two steps.
This next elevation is the last part of the room and contains all the social luxuries.
Set into the wall is a full {Wbar{x serving drinks and food and whatever else an immortal
may want.  There are also a couple private bars ran by the immortals themselves with
small sitting areas that have tables and chairs for socializing.  A few of the residents here are
{YF{yred {*the {YB{yringer{x - resident necromancer and {RB{ri{Rg {WD{wadd{Wy{x, the bartender and illegal
equipment provider.  Just looking at this amazing place would make anyone want to sit
down in a big comfy chair, grab a {yb{Yee{yr{x and laugh at some mortals on the Mort-o-Viewer.
99850.name: {WI{wmmorta{Wl {mL{ro{Run{rg{me{x

description: {X
{*You have arrived at a small landing that looks not entirely unlike the room above.
The only difference is, aside from the location of this ladder which is in a far
corner, is the sarcophagus centered in the room.  The sarcophagus is open.. and
the ladder you descended earlier.. is not there.{x
{x
{*Again a room with not only one opened coffin, but two.. the exit, like always
before, is down, and set off to a corner, while the one you entered through is
simply not there.  It appears you must face another foe before continuing.{x
99858.name: Deeper Into The Crypt

description: {x
{*In a stark contrast to the previous section of the hallway, this area is very dark
and the walls have gone back to black.  The fire arrows have been replaced with arrows
that glow a deep, dark shade of blue, and that emanate a physical chill.{x
99863.name: Hallway In The Crypt

description: {x
{*This seems to be the beginning of a long hallway that stretches north into a darkness
spotted sparsely by torchlight.  Running down the length of the walls are murder holes
used to shoot ballistics.  Arrows protrude from the ones in the immediate area.{x
99860.name: Hallway In The Crypt

description: {x
{*Another room without variance from the others is where you now find yourself.  Stone
walls, no upward exit, and an opened sarcophagus.. yet another nightmare awoken from
it's place of slumber.  Perhaps this really is Hell.{x
99856.name: Deeper Into The Crypt

description: {x
{*It seems you have finally reached your destination.. the end of the Crypt has come
at last.  Though as relieving as this may be, it is still not the end.  A small staircase
in the middle of the room leads up to a wide platform bearing a bejeweled sarcophagus.
No doubt, this is where the master of this crypt lies.  Or.. perhaps he's not asleep
at all.{x
99873.name: Bottom Of The Crypt

description: {x
{*As you leave the large chamber, you walk back into the darkness.  The ground starts
to descend as you continue, and soon turn into steps.  From the bottom of the steps
a bright red glow can be seen.  What else could be in store.. God only knows.  Or perhaps,
not even he does.{x
99866.name: Dead End

description: {X
{*As you enter the large room you step through an opening in the fire, which can
now be identified as a ring, with the only other exit being at the other end.  More
than one thing blocks your escape that way.  One of them, a large demon hovering over
the center of the ring.{x
99868.name: Fiery Chamber

description: {x
{*Another end to the hallway greets you almost as soon as you enter.  There is another
staircase leading you down, further into the crypt.  No glow can be seen coming from
the bottom making it increasingly difficult to keep going on your own light.{x
99869.name: Dead End

description: {c
{*You have reached what looks to be the bottom of the Crypt, as there is not a
ladder leading you further down.. instead there is an opening in the wall to the
east, from which a golden glow can be seen.. perhaps it's the way out?  Whether it
is or not, you are now faced with not two, but three opened sarcophaguses.{x
99859.name: Deeper Into The Crypt

description: You are in the viewing stadium for the great Battlefest Arena,
where only the bravest of warriors dare fight.  The arena itself is
circular as the bleachers follow it around all the way down to the
"floor seats" where the stone benches meet a tall row of bloodied
pikes..  Used to keep combatants from leaving their fight.
99852.name: Battlefest Bleachers

description: {x
{*This room is slightly rearranged compared to the previous few.. though not in a
very pleasant way.  The single sarcophagus in the center of the room in no longer there..
instead, there are two.. both open, splitting the room into thirds.  Does it never
end?{x
99857.name: Deeper Into The Crypt

description: {x
{*The hallway comes to an end just beyond here.. a light from the chamber beyond casts
the illumination for this room in an angled direction.  At the mouth of the hallway
two pikes are posted on either side, each bearing a head on it's tip.{x
99872.name: Hallway Ending

description: {x
{*You stand now in a very large room, so large that it's surprising it can be contained
underground.. you must be very deep within the earth.  The room is quite well illuminated
giving light once again to the horrific walls of death.  The true terror in this room
resides in the middle, where a large almost fish-hook looking device is hanging from
the ceiling.  At the barbed end, an enormous full-sized dragon has been pierced through
its stomach.  There is a sign directly below this gruesome display, explaining what
it is.  What kind of nightmare is contained within this place?{x
99865.name: Large Earthy Chamber

description: The circular arena of the Battlefest annual event stretches out
before you; hard packed sand beneath your feat creating the ground
from edge to edge.  Containing the battle field is a fence of hundreds
of crossed spears.  Spears large enough to keep even the tallest of
competitors from fleeing.  Gore is also a common resident here, as it
is rudely placed all over the ground and the speared wall.  Above that
wall, encircling the actual arena is the overwhelming rows of stone
bleachers meant for containing the fan-base.
99851.name: {rT{Rh{re {rB{Rattlefes{rt A{Rren{ra{x

description: {x
{*Again, the arrows in the walls have changed.  Now they bear fiery tips, casting
a bright light through the hallway.  It is now that the walls and ceiling can be
seen clearly.. they are not actually made from stone, but instead bones.  Bones from
countless creatures have been built into the earth in order to form this evil crypt.
The choice is still yours.. continue.. or die and become a part of the walls.{x
99862.name: Hallway In The Crypt

description: {*As you continue down the hallway, its appearance doesn't differ much at all.  The
only noticeable difference is the objects protruding from the holes in the walls..
they are not just standard arrows anymore.  These are glowing.  Green.{x
99861.name: Hallway In The Crypt

description: {x
{*As you descend into this room, the ladder, again, disappears leaving not even a
whole in the ceiling in which to escape.  This room, like the previous, has a ladder
in a far corner and an opened sarcophagus in the middle.. what horrors could this
room provide?{x
99855.name: Deeper Into The Crypt

description: {x
{*You find your self in a pitch black room, nothing can be seen.  It does not feel
very safe in here.{x
99874.name: Small Pit

description: {x
{*At the bottom of the steps you are in another hallway once again.  Though this one
is short, and the end can be seen not far off.  Beyond the entrance a raging fire is
present, blocking the view of the room.  Near the entrance, two gargoyles frame the
way through.{x
99867.name: Small Entranceway

description: {x
{*There is only one source of lighting here.. a single torch hanging from the ceiling.
Other than that the area is shrouded in darkness.  A battle here would be difficult
at the least.{x
99871.name: Short Hallway
